text: Rottum is a village in De Fryske Marren in the province of Friesland, the Netherlands. It had a population of around 675 in 2017.Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2017 - CBS ==History== Before 2014, Rottum was part of the Skarsterlân municipality and before 1984 it was part of Haskerland. Before 1934, Rotsterhaule was part of the Schoterland municipality. ==References== ==External links== Category:De Fryske Marren Category:Populated places in Friesland
title: Rottum, Friesland
